myProfile.name: Muhammmad Yasir Aziz

education.institute: Pakistan Institute of Engineering and Applied Sciences, Islamabad
education.degree: BS in Computer and Information Sciences (BS CIS)

myProfile.about: I have done web development certification from udemy and I have worked on a variety of projects that allowed me to put what I had learned from the certification. Recently I have also worked on project which was Info System that can handle workloads of employees. Till now, I have done three months onsite internship from Allied Consultants I have almost 6 months hands on experience in front-end development. The tech stack includes tailwind and react js. So now, I am looking forward to a job to gain experience in web development industry.
myProfile.description: An enthusiast programmer, having expertise in front-end development and 6 months hands on experience in front-end development.

myProjects.title: Information System for Visiting Faculty at PIEAS
myProjects.description: Developed a responsive front-end of the information using Bootstrap and ReactJS that can calculate Workload of each employee in each semester. Payment of Visiting Faculty and TAs in each semester.

myProjects.title: Web Based Quiz Application
myProjects.description: A dynamic website which offers students to attend quizzes created by their teachers, developed in JavaScript.

myProjects.title: My Personal Portfolio
myProjects.description: A website that is my portfolio, developed using javascript and the backend is in json format.
